definitions.definition: Any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink or that plants absorb in order to maintain life and growth.
any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink or that plants absorb in order to maintain life and growth
examples: they had eaten their food and slept
music is food for the soul

definitions.definition: the things that people and animals eat
examples: a farmer who grows his own food
drought victims who don't have enough food to eat
She gave food and drink to the hungry travelers.
fruits, vegetables, and other healthy foods
a farmer who grows his own food
drought victims who don't have enough food to eat
She gave food and drink to the hungry travelers.
fruits, vegetables, and other healthy foods

definitions.definition: substances taken in by plants and used for growth
examples: a farmer who grows his own food
drought victims who don't have enough food to eat
She gave food and drink to the hungry travelers.
fruits, vegetables, and other healthy foods
